name: Safe Trading in Bevensen
description:
Welcome to Bevensen!

A severe pandemic has forced you and your neighbours to quarantine in your homes. Living out in the countryside however, your opportunities to obtain sufficient resources are scarce and often denied by panic buyers.

Most of your neighbours belong to the group at risk, are of old age or are afflicted by pre-existing illnesses and prefer trading in the neighbourhood. Manage your resources carefully and trade with your neighbours to keep both them and yourself safe.

The Team:
